bedrock.prelude.sum

Require Import bedrock.prelude.base.

Module sum.
  Definition existsb {A B} (f : A -> bool) (g : B -> bool) (s : A + B) : bool :=
    match s with
    | inl a => f a
    | inr b => g b
    end.
End sum.
